document_data.name: Ninrae
document_data.mainbody:
'''Ninrae''' was a bartender and cook of [[Swordsfall House]], a [[shraehouse]] (a small restaurant/tavern), in the city of [[Silverymoon]] in the [[Silver Marches]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. Around [[1372 DR]], she was a kindly woman of middle years.{{Cite web/My Slice of Silverymoon/Part 2}}

She spent time with [[Chesmyr Morrowynd]], a regular at Swordsfall, and one night showed him how to make [[thaevor potatoes]].{{Cite web/My Slice of Silverymoon/Part 3}}
